Class ManagerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.projectOne.Controller.ManagerController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="manager")
public class ManagerController
extends java.lang.Object
    ManagerController.java Manger creates their responses to employees reimbursement request can also viewing all the reimbursement post from employees and response post
